app.name: App Store & Google Play Reviews
app.short_description: Integrate reviews from the App Store and Google Play into your Zendesk Support account
app.long_description: Reply to reviews in App Store and Google Play from one place with ease. Keep the history of all the changes. Powered by AppFollow.io.
app.installation_instructions: Install the app, setup a channel integration, enter your email and an app link, connect with iTunes Connect (for iOS apps) or Google Play Console (for Android apps). PROFIT.
